body:
This looks like a bug to me.
I think the problem comes from [this line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L1597), which has a special handling case for `dim==1`.
A solution would be to copy [this part](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L1621-L1624) in that condition for `dim==1`.
Could you send a PR fixing that?
